input.sentences: the kids are out helping to gain votes for voters .
the good old boys have their old mobiles out .
the candidates are republican | so get your votes ready .
they have horses on display for something to look at .
the kids are out on the town in the action .
output.sentences: All the children were excited about the election.
The boys made mobiles to commemorate their favorite politicians.
Even though the children were too young to vote, they hoped the republican candidates would win.
Every one was so excited, that they rode their horses and put them on display.
The children knew that times were changing and they would have to take action.
